title: I'm Disturbed With My Father's Choice
description:
Megan lost her mother to Alzheimer’s eight months ago. Now her dad is dating a woman who’s only a year older than Megan! - Dr. Laura: "You'll never see me around one of your bimbos!"

Have you dealt with a parent's poor choice? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
